abilities.name: Poison Pollen
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Vileplume is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.effect: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Trainer card in your opponent's hand.
